mapper.select: SELECT ("신청 안함") AS id, ( (SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_type = 'S' AND meal_application = 'N') ) AS value UNION ALL SELECT ("신청") AS id, ( (SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_type = 'S' AND meal_application = 'Y') ) AS value;

SELECT ("참석") AS id, ( (SELECT count(*) FROM entry WHERE DATE_FORMAT(entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND status = 'N' AND info = "breakfast") ) AS value UNION ALL SELECT ("미참석") AS id, ( (SELECT count(*) FROM user WHERE user_type = 'S' AND meal_application = 'Y') - (SELECT count(*) FROM entry WHERE DATE_FORMAT(entry_time, '%Y-%m-%d') = DATE_FORMAT(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') AND status = 'N' AND info = "breakfast") ) AS value
